name: Shoot for Food
description:
This game is a simple 2D shooter game inspired by games like moorhuhn. You need to hit the Dinosaurs, which are appearing on the screen. Multiple hits in a row will give you a point multiplikator. This multiplikator will be resetted when you miss, or when a dinosaur was able to escape (note that this will not happen instantly when the dinosaur will leave the screen).  An escaped dinosaur will not just reset the multiplikator, but will also give negative points. 

Points of Dinosaurs:

  • Longneck:  80
  • Raptor:  90
  • Pterodactyl: 130

Release Version 1.1 (22.05.2022):
- Fixed: UI Bug for different screen sizes

Everything was created by myself, the only importet assets were the two soundtracks and the shooting sound.

Menu Soundtrack: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/electronic/retro-music-package...

Level Soundtrack: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/8bit-music-album-051321-196147

Shooting Sound: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/shooting-sound-177096

Created by: Daniel Mues
